name: Fruit Rush (yudev)
description:
My entry submission for Finally Finish Something 2021 game jam. This is a project that I have been working on last year but due to pressure and lack of motivation, I didn't manage to work on it consistently. But finally, I was able to finish it! It is a simple game but I really put a lot of effort into it. I hope you guys enjoy playing it!

Fruit Rush is a 2D platformer game that offers a fruity and rush kind of experience to all of you. Run towards the finish line as you collect fruits while avoiding obstacles. Will you accept this fruity challenge?

Controls :

Left Arrow - Move Left           Enter - Select
Right Arrow - Move Right         Up  Arrow - Jump         
Up Arrow X2 - Double Jump

Programmer: Yu https://twitter.com/yudevyu

Art Assets:  Pixel Frog https://twitter.com/_PixelFrog
